snippet: Techniques used to treat traumatic brain injuries, the wounds suffered by many troops in Iraq and Afghanistan, lack rigorous scientific support, a government-appointed panel found.
lead_paragraph: Techniques used to treat traumatic brain injuries, the wounds suffered by many troops in Iraq and Afghanistan, lack rigorous scientific support, a government-appointed panel found.

headline.main: Treatment of Trauma to Brain Is Studied
headline.print_headline: Treatment Of Trauma To Brain Is Studied
headline.seo: Treatment for Trauma From Brain Injuries Needs More Study, Panel Says
